about_the_game:
“The flying kettle powered by tea fuel is the future of humanity.”

Space Kettle is a challenging game where your main and only task is to reach the top of a surreal mountain using the power of the recently developed “Tea engine”. Select the direction of flight, hold the left mouse button, and start conquering new heights. Remember: despite the fact that the tea fuel is constantly replenished, its amount is limited, so use your opportunities wisely. Otherwise, you will feel the bitterness of falling down and constant loss of progress, as well as utter hopelessness. The game is made in the “Over It” genre, which became popular after the release of “Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy” back in 2017.



  • Challenge yourself to reach the top of the unyielding mountain.
  • Journey through the unique map with different locations.
  • Prepare your mental health for constant falls.
  • Fall over and over again, losing all your hope.
  • Accept your fate or keep struggling.
  • And finally, feel like a real Flying Kettle.
detailed_description:
Wishlist the new game!


About the Game

“The flying kettle powered by tea fuel is the future of humanity.”

Space Kettle is a challenging game where your main and only task is to reach the top of a surreal mountain using the power of the recently developed “Tea engine”. Select the direction of flight, hold the left mouse button, and start conquering new heights. Remember: despite the fact that the tea fuel is constantly replenished, its amount is limited, so use your opportunities wisely. Otherwise, you will feel the bitterness of falling down and constant loss of progress, as well as utter hopelessness. The game is made in the “Over It” genre, which became popular after the release of “Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy” back in 2017.



  • Challenge yourself to reach the top of the unyielding mountain.
  • Journey through the unique map with different locations.
  • Prepare your mental health for constant falls.
  • Fall over and over again, losing all your hope.
  • Accept your fate or keep struggling.
  • And finally, feel like a real Flying Kettle.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.9
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT/ATI Radeon 4850
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.11
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.5 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Space Kettle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT/ATI Radeon 4850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.5 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970/ATI Radeon RX470 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Have you ever played a game as a Flying Kettle? No? It’s time to fix this. In this game, your main goal is to reach the top of the unyielding surreal mountain at any cost, going through the test of inevitable falls, constant loss of progress, and deep frustration.
